channel.title: Shaking girls hands?
channel.description:
So, i was at a neighborhood party thing and my friends moms and dads were there i've known them for a few years, for all the dads i'd give them a firm hand shake and a hello but the moms and older ladies? i like didn't know what to do, i felt like it would be disrespectful to shake a older women's hand that you've known for awhile, but i felt like i wasn't close enough to them to hug them. it was so awkward that i just took a few friends and went back to my place..
What do you guys do in these situations? do you ever shake women's hands? or all hugs? or what?

item.title: Shaking girls hands?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Only shake a girls hand if you got a cooties shot ready.

Read full topic

fags!!!

To greet you we would obviously just shake your dangling flappy pussy.[/quote]

But what you should do is say hi, act shocked to see them, then see what they do.

item.title: Shaking girls hands?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

My entire family is all huggers on my moms side, same with most people i know at my church. As for my dad’s side. We had to break my g’pa into hugs, since he was a handshake person. Generally though man, even if you feel is a bit awkward, just give em a hug. A hug never hurts anybody. Sometimes a handshake can just feel like something is wrong with the way they are dressed, they smell, or even things like that to some people. Generally a hug is best imo.

Read full topic
